amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used in contravention of the United States Code pertaining to the knock and announce policy when warrants are served by the police.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill in contravention of section 3109 of title 18, United States Code (knock and announce rule).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 310 (Roll no. 346).
